items.sentence: There is only space for thirty students in this classroom.
I know Tom would think doing that wouldn't be a good idea.
Doing that didn't take as much time as I thought it would.
An extremely important issue was discussed at the meeting.
Doing this the way Tom suggested would save the most time.
Tom started clapping, and everyone else quickly joined in.
Tom didn't know that Mary wouldn't be coming to his party.
I think it's important we finish doing this before Monday.
I think that it's highly unlikely Tom will drink any beer.
Do you think that anyone will care if Tom doesn't do that?
What makes you think that Tom wouldn't be able to do that?
I'd prefer not to call Tom. I'd rather write him an email.
Tom wasn't talking about Mary. He was talking about Alice.
Tom was suspended for throwing a chair at another student.
Tom didn't want to tell Mary that he'd lost all her money.
Tom just told me he doesn't plan to take French next year.
Tom wondered how Mary could be so sure she'd win the race.
Tom hadn't noticed the ring of chocolate around his mouth.
It won't be long before one out of five people owns a car.
We cannot separate the sheep from the goats by appearance.
